QuestData.Title: Lost in the Woods
QuestData.Description:
My student, Amalie, and I have taken it upon ourselves to act as the keepers of these woods. We were away from Drustvar briefly, and upon our return, found the grove infested and the surrounding land corrupted.
Amalie decided that she could deal with the grove infestation alone.
It's been some time since she ran off, could you look for her while you're in the Ashenwood?
QuestData.CompletionText: Is there any sign of her? She's a strong woman, but I worry for her fate.
QuestData.RewardText: She said she would head back on her own? At least she is safe.
